newsitem.title: USA: Liteglow says it sues Russo Securities.
newsitem.headline: Liteglow says it sues Russo Securities.

text.p: Liteglow Industries Inc said Wednesday it has filed a civil suit against Russo Securities Inc of New York City and several related individuals.
The company said the suit is for the alleged failure to carry out investment banking arrangements, and the recovery of its stock.
Liteglow said it filed on April 24th in the circuit court of Broward County, Fla.

The company said the circuit court judge ordered the two million shares of stock remaining in Russo's and the named individuals possession should be "locked-up", and no further sales by these parties should be allowed without further notice or court order.
